channel.title: Remerge all sites back to moparisthebest.com (2)
channel.description:
I think in the post before, most dislikes where there. If we combine the forums there should be war, thats true .
But why dont we make the index page of Moparisthebest.com a sort of choosing where you want to go?
Like the first page should be like this :
For Moparisthebest forums Click Here For Moparscape forums Click here
If people know what i mean
Thanks already, ~Ircdscape P.S (Sorry for my bad english :s )
